pyutil.dir_cleaner module¶

Beginning of script. Not finished.

Run in $PREFIX/tmp.

Can modify to accept user input and fall back to that dir.

Implement once all the logic has panned out.

Todo

Dec 01, 2018:

I was writing this like on termux like 4 days ago. Cleaned up ~/python/tutorials/fnmatch_.py and realized it was the exact same thing.
pyutil.dir_cleaner.clean()[source]¶

Removes all pyc files. Add input for filetype later.

Parameters:filetype – File to iterately remove.
Returns:NoneType

Yeah i said returns. Use return instead of yield since the function call is gonna either require list[clean()] or a loop.

pyutil.dir_cleaner.dir_cleaner(i)[source]¶

Yield all directories before november.
